parameters: Looks like this key opens it.
Looks like this key opens it.
Why are you in a place like this?
This is just one of our adventures.
It must've been a rough journey.
My benefactor lies within this prison.
Though I rushed to save her, I...
Well, you can see what happened.
Travelers, can you lend me a hand?
As for your reward... I'll figure it out.
Ah, you mean you want out of here?
The key to this door must be somewhere...
Understood. I'll try to search for it.
\C[17]Captive Snow Woman\C[0] has been added to the Event List.
Looks like this key opens it.
To be honest, I never expected myself
However, you're not a bad person.
Allow me to thank you once more.
However, I did not expect this outcome,
so I never prepared any reward.
Didn't you say you'll think of something?
That was a lie I made up on the spot.
I figured that might be the case.
Please, do not mind the rewards.
You're not some saint, so be more greedy!
will aid you in your journey.
So, you're coming with us, then?
No, you don't need to go that far...
...Do you say my power is unnecessary?
Since we're friends, I'll lend you a hand, too.
Even though you got deceived by her,
Isn't it natural to help a friend out?
No, that's just how the situation developed...
To think I'd have such wonderful encounters
This girl besides me is Fiede.
I shall use my power for your purpose.
So, do you know where your benefactor is?
She must be in the Isolation Chamber.
If you go in a little further, there's
a bridge that goes to the east.
Use that path to go there.
